Articles.Content:
Hello everybody!

I have a problem.  When I launched the rocket, a pink square appeared on its nose. 

How i can fix it ?

https://ibb.co/wJcqp6R - screenshot.

I don't know the fix but I've seen other posts about similar pink squares. If you didn't already do so, search the forum for all threads with "pink" in the title.

You might get better help if you edit your thread title. Something like "Pink square on rocket" will draw more attention.
